title: Brick Breaker
description: A classic brick breaker game developed using Java Canvas and XML. Features smooth ball physics, paddle control, and brick collision handling.

title: Image Puzzle
description: An engaging image-based puzzle game built with Java Canvas and XML. Rearrange shuffled image tiles to complete the original picture.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A clean and responsive Tic Tac Toe game crafted using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose Canvas. Includes smooth animations and adaptive design.
